participant_1.background:
I've been having trouble focusing on my schoolwork because I'm so caught up in my daydreams.
I enjoy the peace and quiet of the woods when I go hiking on the weekends.
my ultimate dream , however , is to be a writer.
My parents were always busy with work, so I had to get a job early to help make ends meet.
i am a gymnast.

participant_2.background:
I take a walk to clear my head and release endorphins.
i dance ballet.
I love the feeling of the wind in my hair when I'm driving my truck.
I'm passionate about spending time with my family, though it can be difficult at times.
My dogs have been my greatest joy and my biggest challenge.

content.text: Hey! How are you doing today?
I'm doing pretty well, thanks. I'm just getting ready to head out on a hike.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love hiking.
Me too! I always enjoy the peace and quiet of the woods.
I know what you mean. It's a great place to clear your head.
Exactly! I'm actually a bit of a daydreamer, so it's really nice to have some time to myself to just think.
That makes sense. I do a lot of writing, so I also need some time to myself to focus.
That's awesome! What kind of writing do you do?
I'm a journalist, so I mostly write articles for a local newspaper.
Wow, that's really cool! I've always wanted to be a writer, but I'm not sure I have the skills for it.
It's not as hard as you think! Just keep practicing and you'll get better.
Thanks for the encouragement! I'll keep that in mind.
No problem! Have a great hike!
